long_description: Lightweight, full-length EVA baseplate cushioning features pockets of gel to soften landings, making the Burton Genesis snowboard bindings a sound choice for your days spent hucking off cliffs. Re:Flex minimized, cored baseplates dramatically improve board flex and feel, reduce weight and allow a variety of cushioning options. Composite baseplates dramatically improve board flex and feel, reduce weight and allow a variety of cushioning options. FullBED(TM) cushioning covers the entire baseplate to maximize comfort and minimize fatigue; extendable toe ramps reduce toe drag and increase responsiveness. In addition to FullBED cushioning underfoot, bindings feature damping pads and B3 gel. Zero-Lean Kickback Hammock highbacks feature tool-free forward lean adjustment and provide increased response and reduced vibration while your heels are cradled in suspension. New Double Take buckles feature polished, chrome-plated aluminum and lightweight polycarbonate levers to give you buttery smooth and reliable ratcheting power. Burton Genesis bindings feature new Hammockstrap ankle straps and lightweight Gettagrip capstrap toe straps. Burton Genesis bindings are compatible with traditional 3D(TM), 4x4 bolt patterns and The Channel.
short_description: Lightweight, full-length EVA baseplate cushioning features pockets of gel to soften landings, making the Burton Genesis snowboard bindings a sound choice for your days spent hucking off cliffs.
